textContent:
Artifacts:
[Mask of Deceit]
Description: The deamon realm was created to seal the daemons. once upon a time the daemon of deceit deceived his way out of the daemon realm and into the god realm, he did this by reversing his nature, shedding all layers of deceit covering him untill nothing but truth was left, the daemon realm specially designed to keep him sealed was unable to recognize his true form and let him pass. he entered the godrealm and in the first time in his life the daemon of deceit spoke truthfully "Oh mother, Oh Father, Why did thoust created us if only to abandon and seal us?"
Deceit is formless, so should their faces be, this mask will hide your face, shaping it at your will, but you will never be able to have your own face again.
textContentHtml:
Artifacts:

[Mask of Deceit]

Description: The deamon realm was created to seal the daemons. once upon a time the daemon of deceit deceived his way out of the daemon realm and into the god realm, he did this by reversing his nature, shedding all layers of deceit covering him untill nothing but truth was left, the daemon realm specially designed to keep him sealed was unable to recognize his true form and let him pass. he entered the godrealm and in the first time in his life the daemon of deceit spoke truthfully "Oh mother, Oh Father, Why did thoust created us if only to abandon and seal us?"

Deceit is formless, so should their faces be, this mask will hide your face, shaping it at your will, but you will never be able to have your own face again.
